me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport

Interface SMTPClientTransport


  • public interface SMTPClientTransport
    An SMTPClient Transport which should get used to connect to a remote SMTPServer.
    Author:
    Norman Maurer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SMTPClientFuture<FutureResult<SMTPResponse>> connect(InetSocketAddress remote, SMTPClientConfig config)
      Connect to the given InetSocketAddress and returns a SMTPClientFuture.
      void destroy()
      Destroy this SMTPClientTransport and release all resources
      SMTPDeliveryMode getDeliveryMode()
      Return the SMTPDeliveryMode which the SMTPClientTransport use

    • Method Detail

      • getDeliveryMode

        SMTPDeliveryMode getDeliveryMode()
        Return the SMTPDeliveryMode which the SMTPClientTransport use
        Returns:
        mode

      • connect

        SMTPClientFuture<FutureResult<SMTPResponse>> connect(InetSocketAddress remote,
                                                   SMTPClientConfig config)
        Connect to the given InetSocketAddress and returns a SMTPClientFuture. The SMTPClientFuture is notified once the Welcome SMTPResponse was received or an Exception was thrown
        Parameters:
        remote -
        config -
        Returns:
        future

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroy this SMTPClientTransport and release all resources
